CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Mobix Labs, Inc. is a fabless semiconductor company. The Company is engaged in developing disruptive next generation wireless and connected solutions that are designed to cater to a range of applications in markets including 5G infrastructure, satellite communications, automotive, consumer electronics, e-mobility, healthcare, infrastructure and defense. Through its True5G and True Xero technologies, the Company develops ultra-compact, fully integrated, single-chip, single-die, complementary metal-oxide-semiconductor (CMOS)-based beamformers, antenna solutions and radio frequency (RF)/mixed signal semiconductors, as well as hybrid active optical cables, transceivers and optical engines. The Company's products include True Xero Active Optical Cables, True Xero Enterprise Solutions, True 5G Chipset, FR4 PCB Antenna Series, and others.
